## evented() function

Given a class property, this decorator changes it into a setter/getter pair; the setter will trigger `change:${prop}` when invoked

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default function evented(target: any, prop: string, descriptor: any): undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | any |  |
|  prop | string |  |
|  descriptor | any |  |

**Returns:**

undefined
